alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 4:56PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds of 25 to 35 mph and gusts up to 50 mph into the early evening hours. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Blowing dust with reduced visibilities could result in difficult travel conditions in dust prone areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
